name: Liquid Shamans of the Anomaly
description: Often found in nearby Wandererâ€™s Refuge, the Liquid Shamans of the Anomaly  are known for their primarily liquid-based diet. Where do they get their protein? One of the few who witnessed the Osmerian Anomaly, and equipped with the knowledge of what may have actually happened, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
